author: weaver
msg: -  All getPage() operations throw a PageNotFoundException if the page cannot be located
-  ProfilerValve now inokves response.sendError(404) when a PageNotFoundException is thrown.

author: weaver
msg: Remove property checks.  This may have been to heavy handed on my part.  Will look for better
solutions for keeping RequestContext consistent.
